name: DeleteMindmapNode
description:
Delete a mind map node and its children from the board.

This tool is used to delete a specified mind map node and its child nodes from a Miro board. It requires write access to boards and is subject to Level 3 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board from which the mind map node will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the mind map node.

parameters.name: node_id_to_delete
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the mind map node to delete, including its children.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the mind map node that you want to delete.
